ai.summary: London LOOP (Section 22) covers a 9.3 km moderate hike in the UK, offering a mix of urban fringe and green space scenery. This section is suitable for an energetic day hike with varied terrain, including parkland, canal towpaths, and woodland segments.
ai.terrain_summary: The route runs through urban fringe areas, parklands, woodland paths, and along a canal towpath. Expect a combination of pavement, gravel, and dirt trails with occasional muddy patches after rain, gentle to moderate inclines, and some uneven sections. Signs and waymarkers are typically present.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths and follow local signs. Be cautious at road crossings and on canal towpaths shared with cyclists. Canal edges and wet ground can be slippery. Terrain can be uneven or muddy when wet; wear sturdy footwear. Check weather forecasts and daylight hours. Tell someone your plan and expected return time. Carry a map or offline navigation, a charged phone, and a small first aid kit; have a backup plan if services are limited.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation (GPS) and a fully charged phone
Headlamp or flashlight (in case of late return or low light)
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring to autumn generally offers milder weather and longer daylight, while winter hikes are possible with extra caution and suitable gear.

seo.title: London LOOP (Section 22) – 9.3 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore London LOOP Section 22, a 9.3 km moderate hike through urban fringe and green spaces in the UK. Terrain, safety tips, and gear for a day on the trail.
